{"step_by_step_thinking": "Undifferentiated mesenchymal cells are a type of stem cell. According to Document [2], stem cells possess multipotent properties that allow them to differentiate into various cells. Document [8] also mentions that most adult stem cells, including those from dental pulp, are multipotent.
